mapper.select: SELECT e.empno, e.ename, e.job, e.hiredate, e.sal, d.dname, d.loc FROM emp AS e INNER JOIN dept AS d ON e.deptno = d.deptno
SELECT ename, ifnull(sal,100) AS sal, ifnull(comm,0) AS comm FROM emp WHERE empno =#{empno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp (empno, ename, job, sal, deptno) VALUES (#{empno},#{ename},#{job},#{sal},#{deptno})
